name: Lil XXX Wrld
description:
lil_xxx_wrld

------------

You are an up-and-coming musical artist, but your songs lack the verve, panache
and originality they need to take them to the top of the charts. Maybe you should
drink some Faust brand energy drink and face your demons. Maybe then they'd love you.

Hit space bar to procesed usually. Sometimes you can use the mouse, but not always.
Use the mouse or the up/down arrows to adjsut the amount of energy drink you wanna down before hitting the hay.
When you're dreaming, use up/down/left/right arrows to move and space to attack. You can use wasd to change the direction you're facing. You can also use a controller, with left/right analog sticks to look aim and right trigger to attack.
Transcend this reality!

Oh and err something is out of control I guess. Your Faust addiction. That's it.
